skillTree.localised_description: Elasir regularly visits the glades of Averlorn to consult with the ordinary creatures that live there; the critters are privy to the happenings of Ulthuan and beyond, having free reign to eavesdrop without drawing suspicion.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for all Beasts
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +4 for all Beasts
	(Hero's army)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The hatred eaglekind feels for the twisted cousins of Ulthuan surpasses that of most Asur, for the Naggarothi have tortured and killed countless of their proud race. As such, the Great Eagles can sniff out the rank odour of the Druchii’s pure malice the moment one steps foot in Ulthuan.

effects.description:
Enables attribute "Glorious Charge" when fighting against Dark Elves
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Dark Elves

Weapon strength: +6% when fighting against Dark Elves
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

effects.description:
Missile Resistance: +5% for Elasir, Irian, Aeris
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

effects.description:
Spell Resistance: +8% for Elasir, Irian, Aeris
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Not all intentions need be hidden behind words and poetry; sometimes, good diplomacy is direct diplomacy.
A secret kept is a favour to be returned at a later time.
The eyes of the hawk, able to pluck a falling hair with a deft arrow sent from her bow.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Hawkish Precision" for Archers, Lothern Seaguard, Shadow-walkers, Shadow Warriors, and Sister of Avelorn units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

skillTree.localised_description: The eagles of Ulthuan make their home in eyries atop the titanic peaks of the Annulli. It is here where Elasir dwells, soaring the skies above his home with his brothers.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +5% for all Eagles
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: +10% for all Eagles
	(Hero's army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Only a foolish king would dismiss the advice of a being so wise and powerful.

attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: Great Eagles and their kin have an innate ability to sense and see the Winds of Magic, a trait that the Loremasters of Saphery revere.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +20
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Aeris and Irian always fly beside their brother and lord, whether it be on a diplomatic mission or into the thick of battle, their form and prowess as regal and deadly as Elasir’s.

effects.description: Enables abilities "Battle Brother", which will summon Aeris & Irian for a limited time

skillTree.localised_description: Elasir is fluent in Eltharin and can telepathically communicate with his bestial allies. Being able to swiftly relay commands between Elf & Beast allows for unparalleled cohesion in battle.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Eagles
	(all armies factionwide)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10 for all Beasts
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Elasir and his kind have existed on this island-continent long before the Elves. Their sage wisdom is worth a hundred books from the White Tower.
Elasir’s powerful connection to the Winds of Magic enhances his senses far beyond that of ordinary Great Eagles.

effects.description: This character becomes able to see enemies hiding in forest regardless of distance

enabled_if: Winds of magic power is 15 or greater

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: Elasir is heralded as the greatest of his kind, by both Asur and Avian alike. His skill in battle, unparalleled knowledge and diligent defence of Ulthuan have made him famous amongst both peoples.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Giant Hawks
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description:
Ward Save: +5% for all Eagles
	(Hero's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Giant Hawks
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description:
Ward Save: +10% for all Eagles
	(Hero's army)
Replaces abilities "Battle Brother", which will summon Aeris & Irian for a limited time
Upgrades abilities "Battle Brother" to "Unbreakable Bond, which will summon Aeris & Irian for the full duration of the battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Swooping in and out, the great eagle is a dangerous force on the battlefield.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: The eyes of an eagle can spot prey far and wide.
The God of the Hunt blesses those who hunt not for sport but for survival.
A flurry of talons can rend even the toughest of foes.
Those who are "slippery" cannot be cornered or pinned - they simply "slip" away…
The Everqueen and her chosen representatives grant their blessings to all servants of Ulthuan.
An eagle can deftly swoop and roll through oncoming barrages.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
“My claws—a storm, my wings—a hurricane!”

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +15 for Irian
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A gift from Sapherian mages to deflect the harshest of blows
Irian’s razor-sharp beak rips apart just about anything.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description:
Enables "Deadly Onslaught" ability for Irian
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This one is well-versed in the various court intrigues of the Asur, which is something of an advantage in matters of diplomacy.
"The Realms of Man must not fall. Our fate is intertwined with theirs, and if they fall, so too do we."

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +2 with Empire, Southern Realms, Kislev, Bretonnia and Cathay

skillTree.localised_description: Of all the 'younger races', the ultra-secretive Lizardmen respect the Asur the most - enough to grant access to certain high-caste individuals.
The eyes of an eagle can spot prey far and wide.

effects.description: Increases  line of sight of the parent army by 15%.
Increases  line of sight of the parent army by 30%.
Increases  line of sight of the parent army by 45%.

skillTree.localised_description: Trade and investment are the pillars of development.

effects.description: Increase Trade action: Tradable resource production increased by an additional +6%
Increase Trade action: Tradable resource production increased by an additional +16%
Increase Trade action: Tradable resource production increased by an additional +30%

skillTree.localised_description: Wealthy are they who can convince others of their ways without resort to pressure or cajolery.

effects.description: Secure Influence action: Influence is increased by an additional 1
Secure Influence action: Influence is increased by an additional 2
Secure Influence action: Influence is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

items.colour_text: Sharp enough to pierce Dwarfen gromril!

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Enables attribute "Unbreakable" for Eagles & Great Hawks
	(accompanying Lord)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

items.colour_text: Elasir has called upon the doves of Avelorn to aid in diplomatic missions. Their unassuming nature and swift flight make them perfect envoys.

effects.description: Immune to diplomatic penalties from trespassing

Enables attribute "Unbreakable" for Eagles & Great Hawks
	(accompanying Lord)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Eagle Lord guards Ulthuan, his majestic golden brown feathers shimmering in the sun as he and his flock harass and pluck interlopers out of the skies.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Giant Hawks
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
